item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: b6efc156-f0da-4e90-a50a-8c000140b017
Display name: Service Fabric Cluster Contributor
Description: Lets you manage your Service Fabric Cluster. Only provides Service Fabric permissions. You will need additional permissions to manage the cluster's underlying resources.
Link: https://management.azure.com/b6efc156-f0da-4e90-a50a-8c000140b017?api-version=2022-04-01
